boardgame.name: Kaosball: The Fantasy Sport of Total Domination
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Kaosball is a new kind of fantasy sports game, combining rugby-style passing finesse and first person shooter domination-style scoring. The result is a tense game of skill, bluffing, luck, and lethal brutality like you've never played before!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Brought to you by acclaimed designer Eric M. Lang, Kaosball uses exciting card-based play mechanisms to put players in the role of a coach, managing their unique, game-altering team from scrimmage to sudden death period to outscore their opponents. Players need to balance scoring and killing their opponents, using powerful cheating effects all the while _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; as long as you have the money to pay off the ref. No two matches will play the same!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Kaosball includes multiple modes of play: traditional head-to-head, partnerships-based alliances, and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Maximum Kaos_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; three- or four-player mode; 30-60 exhibition games complete with a pregame draft for ringers and team upgrades; and league play with up to eight players and upgrades that stay in place from game to game, creating a unique sense of progression._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: This is for the KBL Passholder kickstarter pledge plus all 11 extra teams and all extra ringers. $255 kickstarter price, selling it for cost. I will send request to change address to yours, so shipping will be free. Game will ship direct to you from Coolminiornot when it becomes available.

This set includes ALL items attributed to the KBL Passholder pledge level on Kickstarter** AND two extra teams - Paragons Team and Samurai Team... That_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s FIVE more teams (plus numerous special ringer figures) that you wouldn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t get if you bought the store version (going for around $80 at the moment.) That_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s five extra teams and several extra ringers (some of both exclusive to kickstarter backers) for $50 extra. Shipping will be roughly at cost. (I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m setting it at $20, and will just pay out of pocket any extra costs...) Here_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s an itemized list of what I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling: Kaosball Core Box (basic retail box, 4 teams..) And kickstarter bonus teams, etc.. - KBL Almanac - Goblins Team - Paragons Team* - Zombies Team (KS exclusive) - Barbarians Team - Samurai Team* - Ringers Pack (includes Kickstarter exclusives) (*the two extra teams not included in the base KS set...) ** Link to Kickstarter campaign: http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/coolminiornot/kaosball (No longer a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;preorder_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, the game(s) have arrived and are unopened down in my (clean) basement..)

Selling my kickstarter backed copy of Kaosball. Brand new and just got the email that it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s starting to ship. As soon as I receive it, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll ship it to you in the continental US free of charge. Includes the passholder level plus addition of all 11 teams. I paid/pledged $255 for this.

CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Game Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! 1x KAOSBALL CORE BOX SEASON 1 (like new, cards in shrink) 1x WORSTHIRE GOBLINS TEAM (like new) 1x SMARIA BARBARIANS TEAM (like new) 1x MALLTOWN ZOMBIES TEAM (like new) 1x GOJIRA (new) 1x GABRIEL (new) 1x KUTULU (new) 1x KONGBAD (new) 1x GANSGTA Z (new) 1x MAZE (new) 1x RUMBLEFIST (new) 1x TYCHO (new) 1x THE WARRIOR (new) 1x ZORRA (new) ------------------- TOTAL = $124.95 SEE 9 PICTURES HERE: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/images/user/80142/rsolow Cool Mini or Not [CMON] SHIPPING Continental U.S. - $17.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - TBD

Everything will not fit in the core box. I used a Really Useful Box to store the teams (not included). There is a slight crease in the box as shown in the photo. The result is a tense game of skill, bluffing, luck, and lethal brutality like you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve never played before! Brought to you by acclaimed designer Eric M. Lang, Kaosball uses exciting card-based play mechanisms to put players in the role of a coach, managing their unique, game-altering team from scrimmage to sudden death period to outscore their opponents. Players need to balance scoring and killing their opponents, using powerful cheating effects all the while – as long as you have the money to pay off the ref. No two matches will play the same! Kaosball includes multiple modes of play: traditional head-to-head, partnerships-based alliances, and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Maximum Kaos_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; three- or four-player mode; 30-60 exhibition games complete with a pregame draft for ringers and team upgrades; and league play with up to eight players and upgrades that stay in place from game to game, creating a unique sense of progression.
